pages.text: 92|15|gajang bulhaenghan jadeulman-i geugos e ileuge doenila
92|17|geuleona hananimkke heonsinhaneun janeun geugos-eulobuteo je-oe doegeoneul
92|18|ideul-eun geudeul-ui jaesan-eul bachi myeo seuseuloleul sungyeolke hasa
92|19|geuga bepun eunhyee daehan bosang-eul geuui ma-eumsog-e gaj-ji anihago
92|20|ojig gajang wie gyesineun junim eul gippeuge hagoja haneun somang-eul ga jin jadeullo
92|21|ideul-eun god wanjeonhan gippeum-eul nu lige doelila
93|5|junimkkeseo geudaeege eunhyeleul bepulgeos-imae geudaeneun ilohayeo gippeohalila
93|6|geubun-eun goain geudaeleul balgyeonhayeo geudaeleul bohohaji ani haessdeonyo
93|7|geubun-eun banghwanghaneun geudaeleul balgyeonhayeo geudaeleul indohaji ani haessdeo nyo
93|8|geubun-eun gananhaessdeon geudaeleul buyuhage hayeo juji ani haessdeonyo
94|3|geudaeui deung-e issneun geu jeom-eun mugeoun geos-ieossnola
